name: Static_strTest
description: Unit tests for the Static.str method with StringBuilder.

test_cases.name: testStrWithNonEmptyStringBuilder
test_cases.description: Tests the Static.str method with a non-empty StringBuilder.

test_cases.name: testStrWithEmptyStringBuilder
test_cases.description: Tests the Static.str method with an empty StringBuilder.

test_cases.name: testStrWithMultipleCalls
test_cases.description: Tests the Static.str method with multiple calls on the same StringBuilder.
